Text: Hmmm, I am guessing that Windows 95 wouldn't even work on today's technology.  I tried running some games from the 90s on the computer in 2003 and they crashed.  Isn't there a technology problem?
This would be for restoration of an old Pentium 1 or 2 computer. Or could be installed to a virtualbox?
This would be for restoration of a Pentium 1 or 2 computer. Installable to a virtualbox?

Hopefully it is possible to install it on a virtual machine, which would be awesome. How else could you test stuff on old browser versions that are still used for some reason at certain organizations? :)
